title: Nutrien
subtitle: Safety Portal
description: Nutrien, the world's largest provider of crop inputs and services, needed a solution to streamline safety document management across 1300 branch locations. The Operating Standards feature simplifies how staff download required global documents and upload completed forms while maintaining compliance.
bullets: Designed an intuitive interface connecting global standards with local branch files
Created responsive components that maintain consistent sizing across all devices
Used user testing insights to identify and address critical compliance concerns
Improved document organization to prevent errors in safety audits

slides.alt: Knowledge Mapping - Documenting complex SharePoint structures to improve team understanding
Design Exploration - Moving from modal interactions to a dedicated Operating Standards page
Final Design - Visual connection between global standards and local branch files
Multi-file Uploader - Consistent component sizing across all breakpoints

technologies.name: 5 of 6 Users
technologies.description: Concerned about file overwrite option leading to audit failures

technologies.name: 35% Reduction
technologies.description: In user errors after implementing visual distinction for documents

technologies.name: Document Organization
technologies.description: Clearer structure for managing global vs. local files

technologies.name: Compliance Impact
technologies.description: Improved audit preparation and safety documentation
